data.text: Jisas ne bɨne okok, kɨli yɨlɨk ma nɨgɨnɨgel God nop agɨlɨg nep yenɨgel agɨl, kɨlop takaw olap paladaŋ lɨl agak,
Man olap bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep olap yenɨgab agak. Pen bɨ anɨb ak, God nop ma pɨlɨkɨnɨgab, binɨb okok kɨlop chɨb ma nɨgɨnɨgab agak.
Bin kaŋɨl man anɨb ak nɨb olap, ne pelpel apɨl nop agɨnɨgab, Bɨ ñagep yad ak, takaw chɨlop ak nɨgɨnɨmɨn agɨnɨgab agak.

Anɨb agɨnɨgab ak pen, bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep anɨb ak takaw nop ak ma dɨnɨgab agak. Ma dek, nop ap mɨnek mɨnek agnɨg gek gek, kɨdek bɨawl anɨb ak agɨnɨgab, Yad God nop ma pɨlɨkɨpin, binɨb okok kɨlop chɨb ma nepin ak pen,
18.5 Luk 11.7-8 bin kaŋɨl awl mɨnek mɨnek ap agek agek, yɨp yɨlɨk gɨnɨgab nen, takaw ne anɨb ak nɨgin agɨnɨgab agak.
Jisas takaw olap sek anɨgɨl agak, Bɨ takaw tɨg asɨkep tɨmel anɨb ak, takaw ne ak nɨgɨm agak.
18.7 Lep 6.10 God ne ke binɨb kɨlop aglup okok, kɨli mɨnek mɨnek nop agnɨgɨlɨg, subnab abe maynab abe, God kɨlop ma gɨñɨnɨgab akaŋ agak? Kod mɨd mɨd, kasek ma gɨñɨnɨgab akaŋ agak? Mel yɨbɨl agak.
18.8 Hib 10.37, 2 Pi 3.8-9 Yad nɨbop agebin, ne kasek kɨlop gɨñɨnɨgab agak. Bɨ Olap Ñɨne pen ne ownɨgab ñɨn ak, binɨb lum awl okok nop gos lɨnɨgɨlɨg yenɨgabal akaŋ mel agak?
Pen binɨb ogɨnap kɨli chɨn mɨdtep gɨpun, binɨb ogɨnap mɨdtep ma gɨpal agɨl nɨgɨlak okok, Jisas kɨlop takaw olap paladaŋ lɨl agak.
Anɨb agak, Bɨ Pelisi olap, bɨ takis dep olap, kɨli God nop agɨnɨg, God agnɨgep kal awl ak amnɨlek agak.

18.11 Sng 135.2, Ais 1.15, 58.2, Luk 16.15, Lep 3.17 Bɨ Pelisi ak gos nab ne okok nep God nop agɨl agak, Nep tep yɨbɨl agebin agak. Yad bɨ ogɨnap gɨpal tek, tap si, bin si, tap tɨmel okok ma gɨpin agak. Yad bɨ takis dep awl tek mel agak.
18.12 Stt 14.20, Ais 58.2-3, Mat 23.23 Wik mɨnek mɨnek pel ñɨn omɨŋal tap ma ñɨbin agak. Pel tap yad mɨdupsek anep wajɨlem ak dɨlɨg, nep nokom olap ñɨl, yad anep ajɨp ak nep dɨpin agak.
18.13 Sng 51.1 Pen bɨ takis dep ak keke sɨŋadaŋ mɨdɨl, God man ne alaŋ ma nɨŋɨd, pabɨl pakɨlɨg gos kuŋay nɨgɨlɨg agak, God. Yad bɨ tap si tap tɨmel gɨpin ak, yɨp mapen nɨŋɨd dɨnɨmɨn agak.

18.14 Jop 22.29, Mat 23.12, Luk 14.11, Jem 4.6, 1 Pi 5.5-6 Nɨbop agebin, God bɨ takis dep ak anɨb agek nɨŋɨd, nop nɨgek bɨ teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Pen bɨ Pelisi nop ma dup agak. Taynen? Binɨb chɨn yɨb awl mɨdeb agɨl nepal okok, God gek yɨb kɨlop apyownɨgab agak. Pen binɨb chɨn yɨb ma mɨdeb agɨl nepal okok, God gek yɨb kɨlop yenɨgab agak.
Binɨb okok, kɨli Jisas ñɨpay chɨnop okok dɨnɨgaŋ agɨl, dad apel, bɨne okok pen binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop nɨg chɨkɨl agɨlak.

18.16 Mat 19.14, Mak 10.14, 1 Ko 14.20, 1 Pi 2.2 Anɨgelak, Jisas ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol okok kɨlop suk agɨl bɨne okok kɨlop agak, Ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol okok kelɨgem, yɨp yɨl owlaŋ agak. God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab anɨb ak nɨm, ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol anɨb okok tek agak.
18.17 Mat 18.3, Mak 10.15 Anɨb ak nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin, binɨb kɨli ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol kɨli God nop muk okok mɨdebal tek ma yenɨgabal ak, kɨli God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab mɨgan ak ma amnɨgabal agak.
Juda bɨawl olap Jisas yek ak apɨl agak, Tisa, nad bɨ tep yɨbɨl agak. Yad tap tay gen, God gek pel pelnep yenɨgayn agak?
Agek Jisas agak, Yɨp taynen bɨ tep yɨbɨl apan agak? Binɨb olap tep yɨbɨl ma mɨdebal, God nokom nɨm bɨ tep yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak.

18.20 Kis 20.12-16, Lo 5.16-20, Lom 13.9, Epe 6.2, Kol 3.20 Pen Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nad nepan, anɨb agup, Chɨp ma ñagɨnɨmɨb, bin si bɨ si ma gɨnɨmɨb, tap si ma dɨnɨmɨb, yepɨs ma agɨnɨmɨb, nanɨm nap takaw agɨnɨgel tek nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agup agak.
Agek, bɨ anɨb ak agak, Yad ñɨsɨkol mug tɨkɨl, takaw anɨb ak kɨdek gɨ dap dap, mɨñɨl ñɨn awl abe kɨdek gɨ nep mɨdebin agak.

18.22 Mat 6.19-20, 19.21, 1 Ti 6.19 Jisas takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd agak, Tap nokom olap nep ma gɨpan agak. Tap nak okok mɨdupsek yokɨl mani dɨl, binɨb yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop ñɨl nɨm, kɨdek tap teplep nad ak yenɨgab, God man ne alaŋ agak. Anɨb ak apin tek gɨl apɨl, yɨp kɨdek gɨnɨmɨn agak.
Agek ne takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, gos palawl yɨbɨl nɨgak. Taynen? Tap ne kuŋay yɨbɨl yek.
Gos palawl yɨbɨl nɨgek, Jisas nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Binɨb tap kuŋay mɨdeb okok, tɨtay dɨl God nop gos nɨgel, kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab agak?

Chag kamel okok ñu alɨguñ yokep mɨgan tek ak amnɨg kasek amnɨgel tek lup agak. Binɨb pen mani tap kɨli kuŋay mɨdeb okok, kɨli God binɨb ne mɨdɨnɨg, koslam yɨbɨl binɨb ne mɨdel, kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab agak.
Anɨb agek, binɨb yelak okok nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Takaw agup anɨb ak, binɨb okok God yɨl pel pelnep yonɨgun tek ma lup agɨlak. Akaŋ tay agɨlak?
18.27 Jer 32.17, Sek 8.6, Mat 19.26, Mak 14.36 Agel Jisas agak, Tap ogɨnap binɨb gɨnɨgel tek ma lup ak pen, God ne gɨnɨg, gɨnɨmuŋ tek nep lup agak.
Anɨb agek Pita agak, Nɨgan, tap chɨn okok mɨdupsek kelɨgɨl, nad ayɨp nep chɨgɨl kɨdek gɨpun agak.
18.29 Lo 33.9, Mat 19.29, Mak 10.29-30 Agek Jisas kɨlop agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin agak. Bɨ mɨdupsek God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab agɨl, kal, bin, nɨmam, nonɨm, nap, ñapay kɨli okok kɨlop kelɨgel,
18.30 Mat 19.29, Mak 10.30 mɨñɨl lum awl mɨdobun ñɨn ak God kɨlop kod mɨdtep gɨl, tap kuŋay nep ñɨnɨgab agak. Pen ñɨn kɨdek ak apek, kɨli pel pelnep yenɨgabal agak.
Jisas bɨ takaw nop dad ameb anep umɨgan ak kɨlop dad gol okok amɨl agak, Nɨgɨm. Mɨñɨl Jelusalem amon, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop bɨlel buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agɨlak tek gɨnɨgab agak.
18.32 Mat 27.2, Luk 9.22, 9.44, 23.1, Jon 18.28, Apo 3.13 Nop dɨl, bɨ Juda mel ñɨn adek okok lel, nop agjulɨg, ñɨñɨloŋ lɨlɨg, kɨñuk gɨlɨg,
nag dɨl pakɨlɨg, pɨsnep paklel kumnɨgab agak. Pen ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak.
Pen anɨb agek, bɨne okok gos nɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lek, takaw anɨb agup agɨl gos ma nɨgɨlak. Takaw jɨj anɨb won ak, kɨlop we gak.
Jisas amɨl taun Jeliko amjakɨlak nɨŋɨd, bɨ wɨdɨn koy mani tap okok nen asɨb agolɨgup olap, kanɨb awl gol sɨŋak besɨg yek.
Binɨb kuŋay nep takaw agɨlɨg padɨkɨlak nɨŋɨd, ne binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop agnɨŋɨd agak, Tay gebal agak?
Agek agɨlak, Jisas bɨ Nasalet nɨb ak apɨl padɨkeb agɨlak.
18.38 Mat 15.22 Anɨb agelak ne suk awl agɨl agak, Jisas, Depid Ñɨne. Yɨp mapen nɨŋɨd dɨtep gɨnɨmɨn agak.

Agek binɨb ned owlak okok nop ag gɨl agɨlak, Taynen anɨb ageban? Kɨmɨgel mɨde agɨlak. Anɨb agɨlak ak pen, ne kɨmɨgel ma yek, suk awl agɨlɨg agak, Jisas, Depid ñɨne. Yɨp mapen nɨŋɨd dɨtep gɨnɨmɨn agak.
Agek, Jisas nɨŋɨd ap alad gɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop agak, Nop poŋɨd yep wulep sɨŋawl owɨm agak. Agek, poŋɨd apelak agak,
Nep tay gɨnɨm agak? Agek agak, Bɨawl. Yɨp ge wɨdɨn yɨbɨl nɨgin agak.
18.42 Luk 7.50, 17.19 Agek Jisas nop agak, Yɨp gek wɨdɨn yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨgayn agɨl gos nepan ak tek, wɨdɨn nɨgan agak.
Agek, won anɨb anep wɨdɨn nɨŋɨd, God yɨb nop ak dad aplanɨlɨg, Jisas amnaknɨŋ kɨdek gak. Binɨb mɨdupsek Jisas tap gak anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, God yɨb nop dad aplanɨlak.
